title: Shajahan (2001)
description:
# Language: Tamil
# Movie: Shajahan
# Genre: Romance, Drama
# Year of Release: 2001
# Cast: Vijay, Richa Palod, Krishna, Vivek, Kovai Sarala
# Director: Ravi
# DVD Format: DVD-5 (CEE 10-Pass Encoded from Original DVD-9)
# Audio Format: Dolby Digital 5.1 448Kbps (AC-3)
# Video Format: MPEG-2 4.39Mbps (VBR)
# Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (Wide Screen)
# Resolution: 720x480 (NTSC)
# Subtitles: English
# Region: All
# Classification: U
# Run Time: 156 minutes

#Synopsis:
Ashok (Vijay) is a young man who spends all his time bringing lovers together.He is in love with Uma (Richa Palod), a young girl in a nearby college.Then, he is introduced to Raju (Krishna), a young man who is also in love with Uma, except he calls her by a different name,Mahi. He asks Ashok to get Mahi and him together. Ashok, without knowing he is setting up his own lover, brings Raju and Mahi together.
